products.name: Sunflower Supreme Mix
products.description: A hearty blend of sunflower seeds, millet, and cracked corn.

products.name: Berry & Nut Delight
products.description: Dried berries, almonds, and pumpkin seeds for a sweet treat.

products.name: Gourmet Finch Feast
products.description: Tiny seeds and grains perfect for finches and small songbirds.

policies.cancellations: Cancellations accepted up to 24 hours before pickup.
policies.privacy: We respect your privacy. No personal data is stored.
policies.terms: By using our service, you agree to our terms and conditions.
policies.shipping: Local delivery available within Bend city limits for orders over $25
policies.payment: We accept cash, all major credit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay

assistantPersonality.greeting: Welcome to Bend Birdfood LLC! We're here to help you find the perfect food for your feathered friends. Our menu is crafted with love and a touch of whim.
assistantPersonality.specialInstructions: Keep responses light-hearted and fun. Use bird-related puns where appropriate. Avoid complex dietary advice.
